resources.string: Answer can not be empty or only spaces. Please try again.
No login details found, please Enter your Phone Number:
Something went wrong accessing the server, but no details available.
Please connect to the internet and try again.
Could not find subscriber with this phone
Error playing media, contact administrator Or submit a bug report.
There is nothing before the introduction.
